### Description

Map of the areas used to measure each variable in the app.

- <b>Blue polygons</b>: SST (for SST and upwelling index, see <i>About</i> for details)
- <b>Red polygons</b>: AT (air temperature, both at ground level and at 2m height)
- <b>Black polygons</b>: chlorophyll
- <b>Bubble markers</b>: location where samples of percebes were collected
